thread.title: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters
thread.title_full: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Justin Bergman, Associated Press
title: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters
text: Photo: AP Roger Federer of Switzerland reacts while playing against Albert Ramos-Vinolas of Spain during their men's singles match at the Shanghai Masters tennis tournament in Shanghai, China, Tuesday Oct. 13, 2015. (Chinatopix via AP) CHINA OUT Roger Federer of Switzerland reacts while playing against Albert... SHANGHAI (AP) — For the second straight year, Roger Federer found himself in trouble in his opening match at the Shanghai Masters. Roger Federer of Switzerland reacts while playing against Albert Ramos-Vinolas of Spain during their men's singles match at the Shanghai Masters tennis tournament in Shanghai, China, Tuesday Oct. 13, 2015. (Chinatopix via AP) CHINA OUT Roger Federer of Switzerland reacts while playing against Albert... SHANGHAI (AP) — For the second straight year, Roger Federer found himself in trouble in his opening match at the Shanghai Masters.
